alert.note: Alert for Barber; Comanche (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 7:26AM CDT until June 21 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barber County in south central Kansas... Eastern Comanche County in south central Kansas... * Until 830 AM CDT. * At 726 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Nashville to 6 miles south of Wilmore, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
